title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound satin with brocading
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 45.7 x 7.8 cm (18 in. x 3 1/16 in.)
description: Gold background with pattern of dragons in blue and white silk and metallic wrapped paper threads. Dark and light blue clouds, yellow flames, and blue moons punctuate the background.

Textile.
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound satin with brocading. Gift of Miss Beatrice Kates. 1940-4-14.
